attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Isle of Wight Council is determined to close our village school.

This is contrary to evidence that proves the viability of such small schools and central government's policies.

On top of this the children will have to  travel up to 14 miles each morning and afternoon.  This will also impact on parents ability to work, they won't be able to make use of pre and post school activities.

When these types of schools are closed it takes the heart out of the community thus impacting on the sustainability of the village.

Please help us to save our school and village.
